text: The 3rd Cavalry Corps was a corps of the Soviet Red Army. It was part of the 11th Army. It took part in the Soviet invasion of Poland in 1939. == Organization == * 7th Cavalry Division * 36th Cavalry Division (Soviet Union) * 6th Tank Brigade == References == Category:Cavalry Corps (Soviet Union) Category:Soviet invasion of Poland
title: 3rd Cavalry Corps (Soviet Union)
